description: Shoots straight down the lane and deals 30 damage. Detonates all status effects on hit.
Homes toward current target and deals 30 damage. Detonates all status effects on hit.
Targets enemy with lowest hull. Detonates status effects for +50% combo damage.
Splits into 3 missiles that each trigger combos on separate targets.
Fires 5 rockets in quick succession. Each can trigger combos.
Deals 30 fire damage and detonates Burn. Applies 3 new Burn stacks after trigger.
Detonates Freeze for bonus damage. Applies 2 Freeze stacks.
Detonates Static and chains to nearby enemies with Static stacks.
Detonates Acid and leaves corrosive pool that deals damage over time.
Detonates Gravity and pulls nearby enemies toward impact point.
Sprays fire in a cone. Applies 1 Burn stack per tick.
Continuous beam that slows enemies. Applies 1 Freeze stack per second.
Electromagnetic pulse. Applies 2 Static stacks to all enemies in radius.
Sprays acid in a cone. Applies 1 Acid stack and reduces armor.
Deploys mine that applies 3 Gravity stacks when enemies pass.
High damage plasma shot. Applies 1 Burn stack.
Piercing shot that hits all enemies in a line. High single-target damage.
Charged beam weapon. Applies Static and deals high damage.
Deploys nanites that apply Acid and heal ship when enemies die.
Instantly regenerate 50% of max shields.
Massive missile that detonates ALL status effects for double combo damage.
Creates storm that applies random elements and triggers combos continuously.
Devastating beam that pierces all enemies in lane.
Launch a missile that deals 50 damage. Detonates all elemental effects on hit.
When activated, cloak and boost down the row at high speed. Turn around and deal bonus damage based on distance traveled.
Launch a blast of 16 auto-attacks down this ship's row at reduced damage (5 per shot).
Mark the ship's current target for 3 seconds. All auto-attacks against this target deal +50% damage.
Gain 40 shields. For the next 10 seconds, any ship that attacks this unit takes 10 damage.
When activated, all ships in a 2 square radius gain +30% attack damage for 8 seconds.
Blast forward 3 squares in the row. An obstacle is created that blocks enemy projectiles and slowly fades over 8 seconds.
Deal 5 fire damage per second to all enemies in a 2 square radius. Every 5 seconds in the field, attempt to apply 1 Burn stack.
High-damage precision strike on current target.
Precision attack with increased critical hit chance (+20% crit).
Electromagnetic pulse that applies 2 Static stacks and drains 20 energy from all enemies in radius.
Gain stealth for 12 seconds. Cannot be targeted unless attacker is adjacent or ship takes damage. +20 evasion while active.
Increase armor by +25 for 15 seconds. Gain damage reduction and become harder to kill.
Overcharge all equipped weapons. +50% attack speed and +20% damage for 10 seconds.
Grant all allies in 3 square radius +15% to all combat stats (damage, speed, accuracy, evasion) for 12 seconds.
